Detailed Description

The global mouse hook. This can be used to globally capture mouse input.

Member Function Documentation

delegate bool Tibia.MouseHook.MouseHookHandler ( MouseButtons  button  ) 

Delegate for handling mouse input.

Parameters:
button The mouse button that was pressed.
Returns:
True if you want the key to pass through (be recognized for the app), False if you want it to be trapped (app never sees it).

static bool Tibia.MouseHook.Enable (  )  [static]

Start the mouse hook.

Returns:
True if no exceptions.

static bool Tibia.MouseHook.Disable (  )  [static]

Disable mouse hooking.

Returns:
True if disabled correctly.
